1.title: Beep! Beep! Beep! Kevins alarm shrieked, it was 6am on Monday morning.
1.B: Hit snooze and go back to sleep

2.title: Kevin is awake and up, time for a drink, what should Kevin drink?

3.title: Beep! Beep! Beep! it's now 6:15am.
3.B: Hit snooze and go back to sleep

4.title: It's now 3pm, Kevin looks at his phone, he has 3 missed calls from work
4.A: Get up and phone in and make an excuse.
4.B: Get up and don't phone work with an excuse.

100.title: Kevin wakes up grogily, he looks at his phone. 7 missed calls and one text. The text is from his boss saying 'You're fired, don't show up here again!!!!'

101.title2: , now kevin has no jog, loses his house and dies alone in the cold. Why did you do this to him, what did he ever do to you?
